trans-unit.source: Represents a control that has an intrinsic value that does not span a range and can be represented as a string.
trans-unit.target: 表示具有未跨越范围，可以表示为字符串的内部值的控件。

trans-unit.source: This string may or may not be editable depending on the control and its settings.
trans-unit.target: 此字符串可能或可能不可编辑，具体取决于控件和其设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取已缓存[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]参数的属性值<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 缓存的属性值必须已以前请求过使用一种<xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: To get the value of a property at the current point in time, get the property by using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Current%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要在时间中当前点处获取属性的值，通过使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Current%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Current%2A>获取属性

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: 有关可用的属性和其使用的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: The cached property values.
trans-unit.target: 缓存的属性值中。

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 请求的属性不在缓存中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]参数的属性值<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: 此模式必须从<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>与<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>以获取当前值的引用。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>获得使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>，它只包含已缓存数据，并尝试获取的任何属性的当前值引发异常。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Cached%2A>若要获取的缓存的值指定的属性，这是以前使用一种<xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: 有关可用的属性和其使用的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: The current property values.
trans-unit.target: 当前的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation.IsReadOnly*> property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation.IsReadOnly*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation.IsReadOnly*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: A control should have its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty> set to `true` and its IsReadOnlyProperty set to `false` before a client attempts a call to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.SetValue%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 控件应将其<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty>设置为`true`和其 IsReadOnlyProperty 设置为`false`客户端尝试调用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.SetValue%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.SetValue%2A>之前</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.IsEnabledProperty>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern"></xref>控件模式。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: 模式标识符传递给方法，例如，<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>若要检索从指定的<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>感兴趣的控件模式</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 设置控件的值。

trans-unit.source: Single-line edit controls support programmatic access to their contents through <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.
trans-unit.target: 单行编辑控件支持以编程方式访问通过<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>其内容

trans-unit.source: However, multi-line edit controls do not support the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>; instead they provide access to their content through the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 但是，多行编辑控件不支持<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>; 相反，它们提供对通过其内容的访问<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern>控件模式。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TextPattern> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern>

trans-unit.source: Value to set.
trans-unit.target: 要设置的值。

trans-unit.source: The UI Automation provider is responsible for converting the value to the appropriate data type.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序负责将值转换为相应的数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The control is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 控件是只读的。

trans-unit.source: The control is not enabled.
trans-unit.target: 未启用该控件。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation.Value*> property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation.Value*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePattern.ValuePatternInformation.Value*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ValuePatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
